requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Big Sur
  • Processor: M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game has not been tested on Intel processors for mac.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
